functionDecorators.name: getBondType
functionDecorators.description: Detect bond type by polyline of bond.

parameterDecorators.name: fnMap
parameterDecorators.description: Function mapping of target bond token.

parameterDecorators.name: submittedType
parameterDecorators.description: If this parameter is BondType.NONE, this function checks up all bond types. Otherwise this function checks up only one bond type.

functionDecorators.name: getBondTypeByID
functionDecorators.description: Detect bond type by polyline of bond.

parameterDecorators.name: submittedType
parameterDecorators.description: if this parameter is BondType.NONE, this function checks up all bond types. Otherwise this function checks up only one bond type.
